location: A field between the two camps.

lines.text: Alarum within. Enter, with drum and colours,  KING LEAR, CORDELIA, and Soldiers, over the stage; and exeunt

lines.speaker: edgar
lines.text: Here, father, take the shadow of this tree For your good host; pray that the right may thrive: If ever I return to you again, I'll bring you comfort.
Alarum and retreat within. Re-enter EDGAR

lines.speaker: edgar
lines.text: Away, old man; give me thy hand; away! King Lear hath lost, he and his daughter ta'en: Give me thy hand; come on.

lines.speaker: gloucester
lines.text: No farther, sir; a man may rot even here.

lines.speaker: edgar
lines.text: What, in ill thoughts again? Men must endure Their going hence, even as their coming hither; Ripeness is all: come on.
